crew: If you could have a conversation with any inanimate object, which one would you choose?
imposter: If you were a vegetable, what vegetable would you be and why?
If you were stranded on a deserted island and could only bring one item, what would you choose and why?

crew: What is something that universally brings people together?
imposter: Can you name a basic human need that everyone requires for survival?
What is a value that is commonly shared across different cultures?
Is there a natural phenomenon that is universally admired or appreciated?

crew: What is a silly thing that always makes you laugh uncontrollably?
imposter: Can you name a funny word or phrase that never fails to make you chuckle?
What is a comical sound or noise that always brings a smile to your face?

crew: What is a conspiracy theory that is so absurd it's hilarious?
imposter: Can you name a funny urban legend or myth that never fails to make you laugh?
What is a bizarre superstition or old wives' tale that always brings a smile to your face?
What is a comical celebrity conspiracy theory or rumor that you find amusing?

crew: If aliens were to visit Earth, what is the first comical scenario you can imagine happening?
imposter: What would be the funniest alien disguise or costume that you can think of?
If aliens had a sense of humor, what do you think would be their favorite Earth joke?
What would be the most amusing inter-species game or competition between humans and aliens?

crew: If you had 3 days to live how would you spend those days?
imposter: What is your ideal vacation?
If you could do anything you wanted right now what would you do?
What is your favorite thing to do on a day off?

crew: If you could go back in time and kill only one historical dictator who would you kill?
imposter: Which historical dictator do you think would do the worst in a fist fight?
Who is the worst historical leader in your opinion?
Which historical figure do you think was the worst?

crew: What is the best way to deal with a hangover?
imposter: What is the best way to get rid of a headache?
If you feel sick, what is your go-to remedy?
What is your favorite alchohol?

crew: If you were a bird where would you fly to?
imposter: If you could go on a trip to anywhere, where would you go?
If you could get on an airplane and go anywhere, where would you go?
If you had to move to another country, where would you move?

crew: If you had to become an insect, which insect would you become?
imposter: If your house were infested with bugs, which bugs would you want it to be infested with?
What is the grossest bug in your oppinion?
If you had to eat one bug that is at least as large as a cricket, which bug would you eat?

crew: Who is the greatest actor of all time?
imposter: Which actor do you absolutely despise?
Who is the most controversal actor?
Which actor do you think you could beat in a fight?

crew: What is the funniest thing you can think of right now?
imposter: What is your favorite dad joke?
What is the dumbest joke you've ever heard?
What is the funniest quote you can think of?

crew: What is the funniest way to get fired?
imposter: What is the dumbest thing you've seen someone do at a job you've worked?
What is an impulsive thought you've had at work that would probably get you fired if you'd acted on?
What is the stupidest way you've been or seen someone get fired?

crew: What is your biggest pet peev?
imposter: If you had to annoy a complete stranger what would you do to do so?
What is something one of your friends does that annoys immensely?
What do you wish people would stop doing that you find annoying?

crew: What is your all time favorite movie or show?
imposter: What is your least favorite movie?
Which show do you wish had a second season?
What is your favorite anime?

crew: If you had to eat only one food for the rest of your life, which food would you choose?
imposter: What is a food that you've tried that was supposed to be good but turned out disgusting?
What food do you believe a majority of people on the earth like or would like?
What is your favorite healthy food?

crew: You have cerial and no milk (this includes almond milk, soy milk, etc.) but you cannot eat your cerial dry.  What liquid are you substituting for milk?
imposter: What is your favorite soda?
What is the best drink to pair with something sweet?
What is your favorite drinkable liquid?

crew: What is your least favorite anime that you've watched?
imposter: What anime should not have been made?
What is your least favorite manga?
What anime would your recomend to your worst enemy?
